desc: Welcome to the online store for The Piercing Urge. Within this store you will find a selection of fine body jewellery that you can purchase now, but a visit in to the studio is always worthwhile as that is where you will find the extra special jewellery pieces.

layout.text:
Beautiful piercings deserve beautiful jewellery. Find the most extensive and exquisite collection of body jewellery in our store. With featured pieces from BVLA. To meet every need and every body, within our webstore you will find a selection of the world's finest Body Jewellery from the worlds best body jewellery artisans.
Visit us in store to see even more beautiful jewellery.
